jobDescription: 10 - 12 years of experience working in large BI, DWH and EDL implementations  Should have strong experience in converting SQL/PL, Data transformations, Data quality and complex SQL's into data lake  Experience using Hadoop Distribution and it's all services for example: YARN, KUDU, OOZIE, IMPALA, HIVE, HBASE, SPARK  Working knowledge of Java / Python & REST API  Conducts facilitated working sessions with technical executives and business experts  Should possess excellent communication and presentation skills and be able to explain complete data transformation and model mapping process.  Understand of Graph Databases  Willingness to learn new data lake technologies and hand on implementation.
